Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1145.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTheatre3/FxUiTheatre3PlayMainScreenRedEx.prefab', 2: '3'}

{1: '"The hero brings the disaster-summoning red rose to the Demon Lord\'s hall. Feigning sincerity, the hero confesses their feelings, winning the Demon Lord\'s trust and favor."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 7: '-4'}

{1: '"Then, without hesitation, the hero summons a curse that even the Demon Lord cannot break, grasping and utterly consuming the Demon Lord!"', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 7: '-1', 9: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTheatre3/FxUiTheatre3PlayMainScreenRedEx.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTheatre3/FxUiTheatre3PlayMainScreenBlueEx.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'The data stream flows smoothly, yet mysterious characters occasionally jump out, randomly recombine, then disappear back into the turbulence.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Hamlet', 3: '...Data modification detected.', 18: '100009486'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab'}
{3: 'The script program falls silent for a moment, then outputs a brand new sequence:'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTheatre3/FxUiTheatre3PlayMainScreenBlueEx.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTheatre3/FxUiTheatre3PlayMainScreenRedEx.prefab', 2: '3'}

{1: '"Before the Demon Lord vanished, the hero returned to the castle hall and offered an invitation to dance together."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 7: '-3'}

{1: '"As they danced until midnight, just as the Demon Lord was about to vanish into the shadows—the hero boldly stepped into the darkness as well!"', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 7: '-1'}

{1: '"With their divinely blessed constitution that resists all poisons, the hero grasps the shadows in one swift move and instantly masters them!"', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 7: '-1', 9: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTheatre3/FxUiTheatre3PlayMainScreenRedEx.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTheatre3/FxUiTheatre3PlayMainScreenBlueEx.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Hamlet', 3: 'Data training and labeling complete.', 18: '100009487'}
{2: 'Hamlet', 3: 'Process terminated, releasing test ID—', 18: '100009488'}
{2: 'Hamlet', 3: 'Release, release, release, test, test test... %*&*(%)/~*@)@#!—#', 18: '100009489'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab'}
{2: 'So you\'re the mastermind behind the "system"—aren\'t you?!', 3: '30'}
{2: "I've already torn through the shadows, do you think I can't guess you'd be next?!", 3: '31'}
{3: 'Seething with anger, the human who tore through the shadows "grasps" Hamlet\'s chaotic data stream.'}
{2: "You won't get away with it...", 3: '33'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiLivWarmActivity/FxUiLivWarmActivityVinylBo01.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTheatre3/FxUiTheatre3PlayMainScreenBlueEx.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTheatre3/FxUiTheatre3PlayMainScreenRedEx.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1143.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest02.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{3: "The human's consciousness seems to float in an endless void, with lingering echoes of dance music still in their ears... and a call from the outside world."}
{3: 'But the human has no time to pay attention to those background noises, focused only on crushing this deranged self-correcting system.'}
{2: '??', 3: "What should we do? No matter how we call, there's no response...", 18: '100009493'}
{2: '???', 3: "Let's use the first-aid equipment! I think it's stored in...", 18: '100009494'}
{2: '(Strike a pose—)', 3: '55'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{1: '0', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest02.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'BZZZZZAP!!!'}
{2: 'Aargh!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest02.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest03.prefab'}
{3: 'Clutching their chest, the human bolts upright from the testing pod.'}
{3: 'Upon opening your eyes, the anxious faces of Ayla and Leonie hover just inches away.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Ah! Thank goodness, Commandant's awake!", 4: '1', 18: '100009495'}
{2: 'Why... did you have to shock me...', 3: '73', 4: "I've had enough.", 5: '73', 6: 'Did you program some taser lord in the system?!', 7: '73'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Your condition was getting critical, but the Star of Life emergency team hadn't arrived yet... so we went ahead and used the AED on you!", 4: '1', 18: '100009496'}
{2: "That wasn't necessary... *cough*...", 3: '76'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Are you... still feeling unwell? The Star of Life has a VIP ward waiting for you, and we've reserved a bed...", 4: '1', 18: '100009497'}
{3: "Watching Ayla's gestures, the human struggles to form coherent sentences, only managing to raise a hand to indicate they are alright."}
{2: "Never mind... I'm... fine.", 3: '79'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Phew... you scared me half to death. Hamlet seems to have been temporarily controlled by some virus, locking you and another test subject inside the system.', 4: '1', 18: '100009498'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonie', 3: '...Whew, I thought we might have a fatality on our hands. Thank goodness we avoided an accident!', 4: '2', 18: '100009499'}
{3: "After confirming the test subject is not seriously injured, Ayla and Leonie step forward to remove the virtual connection equipment from the human's body."}
{3: 'When your feet touch the "real" ground again, you feel a momentary, strange sense of unreality.'}
{3: 'You raise a hand, repeatedly clenching it tight, the subtle feedback and resistance from muscles reaffirms that you are back in "reality."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Are you... still feeling unwell? The Star of Life has a VIP ward waiting for you, we've reserved a bed...", 4: '1', 18: '100009500'}
{2: "...No need, I'm fine now.", 3: '91'}
{2: 'Have you got all the test data?', 3: '92'}
{3: 'Leonie turns her attention to the portable terminal in her hand, skillfully bringing up the control panel to examine the data.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Leonie', 3: 'Everything looks fine, all the relevant data was successfully collected. But when I think about how this data was gathered under such dangerous circumstances, I still feel quite...', 4: '2', 18: '100009501'}

{2: 'Ayla', 3: "This is the most serious testing issue we've ever had. We must suspend all testing of the new Hamlet plugin, submit all the data from this round, and conduct a complete review and overhaul of the entire system!", 4: '1', 18: '100009502'}

{2: 'Leonie', 3: "Wow... so many intense data fluctuations... The test subject's emotional responses to the script were incredibly rich. This has provided us with exceptionally valuable reference samples.", 4: '2', 18: '100009503'}
{2: 'Well... At least the test is completed.', 3: '102'}
{2: "Don't let this kind of mishap happen again.", 3: '103'}
{2: 'Leonie', 3: 'Never again! I promise!', 4: '2', 18: '100009504'}
{3: 'Leonie offers a quick salute, then hurries away.'}

{2: 'Leonie', 3: "I think I've found the problematic module! I'll track it down right away—I won't let Commandant's efforts go to waste! Ayla, I'm counting on you to handle the remaining feedback work!", 4: '2', 18: '100009505'}
{3: 'Leonie rushes out of the room like a gust of wind, leaving Ayla standing alone.'}
{3: 'Ayla fidgets with the terminal in her hands, appearing somewhat nervous.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Um... Commandant... could I please ask you to provide some additional feedback about the story elements? I've got the questionnaire all ready!", 4: '1', 18: '100009506'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Whatever feedback you provide, the WGAA will take it very seriously!', 4: '1', 18: '100009507'}
{3: "Taking the terminal and stylus from Ayla, the human's eyes scan over the densely packed survey questions."}
{3: 'What kind of feedback should you write? Holding the stylus, you hesitate, unsure how to begin.'}
{3: 'After experiencing this scripted story... your initial feelings have transformed.'}
{3: 'Just then—the sound of an opening door interrupts these thoughts as a figure steps into the room.'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: "【kuroname】? Didn't expect you to hide here. Are you slacking off?", 4: '1', 18: '100009508'}
{1: '1', 3: "Gazing at the visitor's red hair and new coating, you feel a momentary disorientation."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest01.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory531.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory531.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory531.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest02.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest03.prefab'}
{3: "Unable to control drifting thoughts, it feels less like standing in the World Government Association of Art's room and more like returning to that ancient castle."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "What's wrong, your eyeballs stop working? Want me to fix you up?", 4: '1', 18: '100009509'}
{3: "Vera leans casually against the doorframe, observing the human's expression, an amused smile playing across her lips."}

{2: 'Vera', 3: "We're about to head out on a mission, so your leisure time is officially over—even Celica didn't know where you were, and I had to be the one to track you down.", 4: '1', 18: '100009510'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Heh, I figured you\'d be here. No one escapes my "investigation."', 4: '1', 18: '100009511'}
{2: 'What is the mission exactly?', 3: '145'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Just a routine investigation of the conservation area and cleanup around its perimeter. Should be a piece of cake for our renowned "hero," right?', 4: '1', 18: '100009512'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Just so you know, I'll be your partner for this operation.", 4: '1', 18: '100009513'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'While missions without challenges bore me, having you by my side might provide... other forms of entertainment.', 4: '1', 18: '100009514'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgComic/V340Vera/V340_06_05.jpg'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "If I'd kept the puppet in the attic, perhaps I could have found some other amusements before everything ends.", 18: '100009515'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In a daze, those familiar lines stir something within. For a moment, you find it hard to tell whether you have returned to reality or still remain trapped within that virtual castle.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1193.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1193.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1193.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest02.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest03.prefab'}
{3: 'The figure trapped inside the castle begins to overlap with Vera standing before you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "What are you spacing out for? Hurry up and prepare for the mission. I'm not waiting around for you.", 4: '1', 18: '100009516'}
{3: "Vera's words snap you out of your momentary trance. With no time for further conversation, you have to leave first."}
{2: 'See you at the transport port then.', 3: '174'}
{3: 'You hurriedly leave the World Government Association of Art to prepare for the upcoming mission.'}
{3: '—Little do you know that behind you, the red-haired Construct stares at your retreating figure with a thoughtful expression on her face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'The script I prepared was "Into the Demon Castle"... how did it become such a mess...?', 4: '1', 18: '100009517'}

{2: 'Vera', 3: "...Whatever, I'll come back and get to the bottom of this another day. Ayla, I've got to go too. As we agreed before, don't tell Commandant that I was the other test subject.", 4: '1', 18: '100009518'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "And don't forget, WGAA owes me free opera tickets for the next three whole months—as you promised.", 4: '1', 18: '100009520'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'The mission with Vera on the ground has concluded smoothly. Just as she said beforehand, it was nothing more than routine work.'}
{3: 'Having Vera as a companion makes everything feel more secure. This time, the mission was completed perfectly without even a scratch.'}
{3: 'Finally, on this ordinary afternoon with everything wrapped up, you get a rare chance to enjoy some leisure time.'}
{3: 'According to Celica, Babylonia will be hosting a ball this afternoon, open to both staff members and Constructs alike.'}
{3: 'The ball will begin at dusk and continue for an entire day, spanning through midnight until dawn.'}
{3: 'Since noon, many staff members have been spotted in the hallways discussing what to wear to the ball or planning to invite close friends as dance partners.'}
{3: 'But for some reason, you do not feel like joining in that festive atmosphere today.'}
{3: 'You recline on the sofa, wrapped in a comfortable blanket, idly flipping through a slightly yellowed paper book.'}
{3: 'Though the leather cover shows signs of age, the gold-embossed script still gleams brightly—"Into the Demon Castle."'}
{3: "You remember the slightly surprised look in the librarian's eyes when you borrowed this book."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory101.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Librarian', 3: 'Would you like to borrow this book?', 4: '1', 18: '100009521'}
{2: 'Librarian', 3: '"Into the Demon Castle"... To be honest, this book has rarely been borrowed since it was added to the library collection.', 4: '1', 18: '100009522'}
{2: 'Librarian', 3: "It's quite unusual for the Gray Raven Commandant to borrow this...", 4: '1', 18: '100009523'}
{2: 'Ah... I came across some interesting excerpts,', 3: '208'}
{2: 'so I wanted to borrow it to read the full text.', 3: '209'}
{3: 'Ever since the "Hamlet" module went haywire, you have been consciously and unconsciously searching for these hero-themed books, curious to see what the original stories were like.'}
{2: 'Librarian', 3: 'Ohh—I see. Then this legend-themed story is indeed an excellent choice.', 4: '1', 18: '100009524'}
{3: 'The librarian hands over the book with a radiant smile.'}
{2: 'Librarian', 3: 'Speaking of which, it also has a companion volume. Would you like to borrow that one as well?', 4: '1', 18: '100009525'}
{2: 'Librarian', 3: 'I heard it\'s a story the author rewrote after experiencing a major life change and "turning over a new leaf."', 4: '1', 18: '100009526'}
{2: "What's the title?", 3: '215'}
{2: 'Librarian', 3: '"Reborn: When the Hero Becomes the Supreme Overlord."', 4: '1', 18: '100009527'}
{2: 'Librarian', 3: 'Alright, so just "Into the Demon Castle" today—what a coincidence, you\'re the second reader to borrow this book this week.', 4: '1', 18: '100009528'}
{2: '...May I know who the other borrower was?', 3: '220'}
{2: 'Librarian', 3: 'Of course, let me check the records. The other borrower is...', 4: '1', 18: '100009529'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'Perhaps due to mental exhaustion these past few days, you surrender to the warm drowsiness enveloping yourself while holding the slightly yellowed pages.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlowlyCloseEye.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlowlyCloseEye.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "Your body seems to continue along that small path in the palace of memories, until arriving before the gates of the Demon Lord's castle."}
{3: 'Swirling snow blankets the castle towers, painting everything in sight a pristine white.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgComic/V340Vera/V340_05_08.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgComic/V340Vera/V340_05_08.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgComic/V340Vera/V340_05_08.jpg'}
{3: 'As you push open the ballroom doors, rose petals scattered across the floor swirl up in the breeze, lingering affectionately at your side, releasing a subtle, elusive fragrance.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgComic/V340Vera/V340_05_08.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgComic/V340Vera/V340_05_08.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgComic/V340Vera/V340_05_08.jpg'}
{3: 'Soon... The rose fragrance in the air grows stronger, and the uniquely gentle touch of petals lightly brushes against your cheek.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Such a relaxed look... What a rare sight.', 4: '1', 18: '100009531'}
{2: '??', 3: 'I wonder... would you even feel a blade against your neck right now?', 4: '1', 18: '100009532'}
{3: 'Something seems to touch your face, but it is not the cold edge of a blade—only a soft texture instead.'}
{3: 'The touch slides down from your cheek, gently moving to the neck, causing a slight tingling sensation.'}
{2: '(Open your eyes.)', 3: '260'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Opening your eyes, you see a bright red rose and the even more vivid red hair of the person holding it.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What a shame. I was thinking of doing something else to you.', 4: '1', 18: '100009534'}
{2: "I wasn't asleep.", 3: '270'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Heh, "I wasn\'t asleep"—listen to how exhausted you sound. You\'re clearly drowsy.', 4: '1', 18: '100009535'}
{3: 'You have no idea why Vera would come to your lounge at this time, but you struggle to find the right words to ask.'}
{3: "Fortunately, Vera already perceives the human's thoughts from their expression."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Judging by your face, are you wondering why I'm in Gray Raven's lounge? Am I not welcome?", 4: '1', 18: '100009536'}
{2: "...That's not what I mean.", 3: '279'}

{2: 'Vera', 3: 'After we\'ve been so busy for so long, it\'s only natural that I, as the Gray Raven Commandant\'s battle partner, should come and properly "check in" on you.', 4: '1', 18: '100009537'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Though I didn\'t bring any "get-well gifts" this time—just casually picked this flower from the greenhouse.', 4: '1', 18: '100009538'}
{3: 'Vera casually places the rose into a glass on the nearby table, crystal-clear dewdrops still clinging to its petals.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hmm? What book are you reading?', 4: '1', 18: '100009539'}
{3: 'Curiosity piqued, Vera quickly leans in—her silky red hair brushes against your cheek, carrying with it a cool, fresh fragrance.'}
{3: 'Before you can hide "Into the Demon Castle" under the blanket, Vera\'s hand firmly grips your wrist and snatches the still-open book away.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Why try to hide it? Think you're too good for this now? You really thought you could keep your little secret from me?", 4: '1', 18: '100009540'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Want to find out what happens when you keep secrets from me, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1', 18: '100009541'}
{3: 'Her face draws even closer, her eyes gleaming with an enigmatic smile.'}
{3: 'She raises one hand, points it at your forehead, and makes a shooting gesture.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Now you're my trophy, under my control.", 4: '1', 18: '100009543'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hahaha... Prepare yourself to live as my prisoner from now on.', 4: '1', 18: '100009544'}
{3: 'She grips your chin with one hand, forcing you to look up and meet her gaze.'}
{3: 'In her other hand is "Into the Demon Castle," open to the page where you left off reading.'}
{3: 'Her grip on your chin loosens, and her fingertips gently trail across your cheek.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'So the Grey Raven Commandant has such a childish side? Reading a story meant for kids?', 4: '1', 18: '100009545'}
{2: "Just something to pass the time when I'm bored.", 3: '307'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Oh really? I\'d like to see what kind of "pastime" puts you to sleep mid-reading.', 4: '1', 18: '100009546'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Come on, read this story to me.', 4: '1', 18: '100009547'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5501_24.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5501_24.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5501_24.jpg'}
{3: 'Vera releases her hold and lies down on the sofa—kicking you to the corner in the process.'}
{3: "Though you're puzzled by Vera's sudden interest, her request touches something deep within you."}
{3: 'The clock hands tick silently forward as the artificial sunlight gradually sinks below the horizon. Evening approaches.'}
{3: 'Faint laughter and music drift from afar—the dance party seems to have begun.'}
{3: 'But here in this lounge, only the two of you savor the tranquility together.'}
{3: 'Sunset glow streams through the window, bathing you both in perfect light, as if the entire world is enveloped in a peaceful, luminous halo.'}
{3: "You become acutely aware of Vera's closeness, feeling the unique warmth of a Construct radiating through your clothes."}
{3: 'You return your gaze to the page and begin reading, savoring each word.'}
{2: 'Until that day, when the hero arrived at the castle gates...', 3: '325'}
{3: "You're about to turn the page to continue reading when Vera's hand stops yours."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Wait. I've changed my mind. What I want to hear is—how would you finish this story?", 18: '100009548'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'If you were writing it, what would happen after the hero enters the castle?', 18: '100009549'}
{3: 'Her pomegranate-red gaze searches yours. As you look into her eyes, something stirs in your heart.'}
{3: 'In this moment, you want nothing more than to tell a story that belongs only to you and her.'}
{3: 'You set the book aside, gather your thoughts, and begin to tell your own version...'}
{2: 'The hero draws their weapon and fearlessly enters the castle...', 3: '332', 4: 'The hero puts down their weapon and enters the castle...', 5: '332'}
{3: 'The story has reached its conclusion, and you have given the answer that lies in your heart.'}
{3: '—You refuse to accept a predetermined tragedy, unwilling to witness everything end and perish, unwilling to let the story rush toward a silent conclusion.'}
{3: 'As long as you follow your heart, continuing to fight and persevere...'}
{3: 'Then, a [Good Ending] will always await you.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Librarian', 3: "What a coincidence, you're the second reader to borrow this book this week.", 4: '1', 18: '100009550'}
{2: 'Librarian', 3: 'Of course, let me check the records. The other borrower is...', 4: '1', 18: '100009551'}
{2: 'Librarian', 3: 'Vera from Cerberus.', 4: '1', 18: '100009552'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'As your retelling of the story draws to a close, the lounge returns to its original tranquility.'}
{3: 'The rose in the water glass continues to bloom silently, while a gentle breeze carries the melody from a distant ball.'}
{3: 'Vera no longer looks at you, instead gazing quietly out the window, seemingly lost in the melody of the music.'}
{2: '(Take the rose from the glass.)'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Why are you taking it out? Don't you like the flower?", 4: '1', 18: '100009553'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '...Or are you refusing the gift I gave you?', 4: '1', 18: '100009554'}
{2: 'No, let me try this instead.', 3: '359'}
{3: "You reach out and brush your fingers through Vera's hair, the silky strands flowing like water across your fingertips."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Tch, what's your obsession with my hair?", 4: '1', 18: '100009555'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: '...Hmph, what a childish trick...', 4: '1', 18: '100009556'}
{3: "A moment passes as you use the rose to pin back Vera's crimson hair."}
{3: 'The blooming rose rests at her temple, its vibrant color especially dazzling against her hair in the sunlight.'}
{2: '(Reach out to Vera.)', 3: '370'}
{2: 'May I have the honor...', 3: '372'}
{2: 'of dancing with you until the clock strikes?', 3: '373'}
{3: 'Vera smiles, extending her hand in acceptance of your invitation.'}
{3: 'Just like that moment at "the castle," she places her hand in yours, exactly as she did then.'}

{3: 'Hand in hand, you leave the room and step together into the grand ball.'}
{3: 'Gone is the gloomy castle, gone is the cold curse. A gentle breeze carries the scent of roses once more as warm sunlight bathes your bodies.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Then let\'s dance together... "until dawn breaks."', 4: '1', 18: '100009559'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Librarian', 3: 'Excuse me... are you sure you want to borrow this book?', 4: '1', 18: '100009560'}
{3: 'A pair of white "wolf ears" perk up from across the desk. Their owner sniffs the air, then nods affirmatively.'}
{2: 'Librarian', 3: "Huh? You want the digital version transferred to your Audiovisual Terminal? Ah... that's fine too. Please wait a moment.", 4: '1', 18: '100009561'}
{3: 'Three minutes later, the librarian returns with a beaming smile.'}
{2: 'Librarian', 3: 'Good news! "Reborn: When the Hero Becomes the Supreme Overlord" has been loaded to your Audiovisual Terminal!', 4: '1', 18: '100009562'}

{2: 'Librarian', 3: "By the way, the WGAA has launched a new service for e-books. It lets you import book content into a specialized virtual reality module for immersive storytelling—it's incredibly realistic! Would you like to try it?", 4: '1', 18: '100009563'}
{2: 'Librarian', 3: '...You want to find someone else to try it? That works too!', 4: '1', 18: '100009564'}
